column4: lo all. I am trying to get ubuntu and my nvidia card working together but I seem to be having issues.  I have installed nvidia-glx and nvidia-kernel-common packages and I have run nvidia-xconfig but X will not start if the driver in xorg.conf for the video card is "nvidia"  it will however start if I use "vesa".  Anyone have any ideas?
video card documentation is HUGE on the forums, search there for your model number and you'll probably get step by step instructions
this apears in the file but doesnt make much sense as my card is PCI not ISA.... (II) Primary Device is: ISA (EE) No devices detected."
following step by step instructions is how I've gotten here :)
